extendedInfo.description: Durdans Hospital is a trusted and recognised name for patient healing and is synonymous with medical expertise and trusted nursing care which is our tradition. This free application for all offers convenience in accessing important details of services whenever you require. A must have app in your smart phone or tab for any medical emergency or need. The app encompasses of the following features:Helpline 1544 is a one touch button to connect you to the hospitalâs call centre via any telecom service provider in Sri Lanka Specialist Availability â Search for the availability of specialist consultants based on the name, specialty or day.Health Check-ups - Details of various health check-ups with investigations and contact details to inquire on more details or make an appointmentPay online â The convenient way for anyone to pay an inpatient hospital bill partly or in full.  Contact us â Provides important telephone numbers, addresses and other contact information of locations Island wideAccommodation & Service Rates - Provides rates of accommodation options and services provided.Information on core specialities, specialities and complimentary services availableFeedback - Your feedback is valuable to us. We would love to hear about your experience and suggestions and how you would rate us.About usFAQ Image GalleryRegister Online - Register for free to receive a convenient service as we do not require your details every time you visit.Durdans Hospitalâs app offers convenience and rewards for all uses.

reviews.title: Bad app
reviews.comment: Not working...  don\'t waste your time and data...
